name: Pretzel Bratwurst Bites
author: Juliana Hale
summary: Put bratwurst slices in the middle of pretzel bites to create a new and delicious snack made easy with pizza dough. Serve with mustard.
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Lightly grease a baking sheet or line with foil
Stir together water and baking soda in a large saucepan
Meanwhile, turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface
Wrap each strip tightly around a bratwurst in a spiral, pinching edges to seal and leaving about 1/2 inch of bratwurst peeking out of each end
Add 3 wrapped bratwurst at a time to the boiling water
Transfer bratwurst to the prepared baking sheet
Bake bratwursts until golden brown, about 12 minutes
Cut each bratwurst crosswise into thirds
